com.att.ads.sample
Class AdsApplication

java.lang.Object
  Application
      com.att.ads.sample.AdsApplication

public class AdsApplication
extends Application

This class is used to maintain Global application state and it is implemented as a Singleton context. This class will be instantiated when the process of the application is created.

Author:
ATT
